sentences.sContent: He later got a call from the CIA, which was looking for a forger. Barron believes the judge recommended him.
sentences.sContent_eng: He later got a call from the CIA, which was looking for a forger. Barron believes the judge recommended him.
sentences.sCn: 后来，中央情报局要找造假者就给他打了电话，Barron相信是那位法官推荐了他。

remMethod.val: 来自forge(v. 伪造； 打铁)

words.tran: 伪造（forge的过去式）；锻造（金属）

trans.tranOther: someone who illegally copies documents, money, paintings etc and tries to make people think they are real
